title: Can't Log into new client
body: So for some reason i can't log into the new client but when i go to legacy it works fine, obliviously i know the password because i'm posting this but i want to use the new client any ideas?

replies.body: Fuck I can't log in I know my password but I can only log in into legacy and i am in the us
I have same problem, but in EUW

It sounds like you might be connected to the wrong region on the updated client.  Make sure you're on NA and try again.  If that's not the case, let me know what errors you're seeing exactly.  Let me know if that was it!

Hmm thanks for trying but this didn't seem to be the problem, it just tells me that I have a invalid username/password combination
Screenshot : https://gyazo.com/62c2dcee924132e0bad59c6384f60529

It's really weird that you can login to one version but not the other.  Our tech team can take a look at this individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Hit us up and we'll work towards figuring it out!
Have you tried to reset your password, it could be your account has somehow been accessed by someone other than you.
I have not tried due to the fact that i can log in with the legacy client so i doubt anyone is on my account
